item.description:
UPDATE 2/22/11:  We need to change the location to the Black Swan in Georgetown.  New Price is $19.95 pp.

 

 

 

Let's go out to Nathaniel's at the Hawthorne Hotel and enjoy a nice Jazz Brunch.

Nathaniel's offers a Prix Fixe menu for 16.95 or an ala carte menu.

some of the items on Prix Fixe are Fritatas, French Toast, Belgian Waffles, Meatloaf, Pastas, Seafood, and plenty of Desserts.

This event will be a great opportunity to socialize with your fellow members, while listening to some Jazz music and relaxing over some great food.

So come on out to Salem with us for a great Sunday midday event.

Please remember, a reservation will need to be made for this event. Only serious RSVP's should respond and if your plans change please contact one of the organizers.

Keep in mind that foul weather could cancel this event but the organizers will try to do so as early as possible.

Hope to see you at the Hawthorne
Donna & Janet
item.name: Jazz Brunch @ Hawthorne Hotel Now at the Black Swan Georgetown
